title: Swarna Pushpa Vanki - Diamond Floral Gold Bangle
materials: GH Color. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant sheen.
features: A delicately crafted bangle featuring a continuous floral motif. Each flower is adorned with a cluster of brilliant-cut diamonds, meticulously set in a prong setting to maximize their sparkle. The gold is formed in a fluid, wavy design, offering a contemporary take on the traditional Vanki (armlet) style. The design ensures comfortable wear and lasting beauty.
colors: Radiant Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds
a classic and universally flattering combination.
occasions: and festive occasions like Sankranthi or Diwali. Its modern design makes it suitable for contemporary events and everyday elegance
description: This Swarna Pushpa Vanki is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The sparkling diamonds and lustrous gold create a captivating contrast, while the floral motif symbolizes prosperity and beauty. The bangle's modern take on a traditional design makes it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The superior Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's natural brilliance, ensuring a lasting investment.
